snippet.title: Dragon Ball Z Shinbutohden/ ドラゴンバールＺ 真武闘伝 Gameplay (Saturn)
snippet.description: The initial release of Dragon Ball Z for the Sega Saturn, this game is a one on one fighting game similar to other fighting games in the 1990s. Produced by Bandai in 1995 it used all the original voice-overs from the series and animation style art for its characters, a first for the series. With 27 players to choose from Dragon Ball Z gave you enough variety to relive all your favorite battles from the series!
